translation: His glorious grandsire, the oldest of the Kauravas, roared like a lion to cheer Duryodhana and blew his conch.
commentary: 1.12 his his (Duryodhanas)? Sanjayan causing? Harsham joy? Kuruvrddhah oldest of the Kurus? Grandfather: grandfather? lions roar lions roar? Vindya having sounded? Loudly loudly? conch conch? Dadhmau blew? glorious the glorious.No Commentary.
